welcome_message_body: Welcome to Qincheng, China! This charming city is known for its rich history, beautiful scenery, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Qincheng has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: KFC (肯德基)
restaurants.description: KFC (肯德基) is a fast food restaurant located in 天水.
restaurants.address: 1 Dazhong Rd (Minzhu), 天水, 甘肃, 741000

restaurants.description: 八大碗乡土菜 is a chinese restaurant located in 秦城区.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
